items.title: Is The Home Depot, Inc. (HD) the Best Dow Stock?
items.description: We recently published a list of The Best and Worst Dow Stocks. In this article, we are going to take a look at where The Home Depot, Inc. (NYSE:HD) stands against other Dow stocks. The Dow Jones Industrial Average is a benchmark index of the top 30 companies in the US. It represents the strength [â€¦]

items.title: Home Depot (NYSE:HD) Secures New US$7 Billion Credit Agreements For Business Flexibility
items.description: On May 6, 2025, Home Depot (NYSE:HD) significantly restructured its debt strategy by terminating a $2 billion credit facility and securing new facilities totaling $7 billion. This move underscores the company's focus on enhancing its financial flexibility and liquidity. Over the past month, Home Depot's share price edged up by 2%, aligning with a broader market environment where the Dow Jones and S&P 500 have shown mixed results as investors are cautious about tariff developments and awaiting...
